name: Daxx
description:
Daxx is a Dutch software development and technology consulting company with 20 years of experience and 425+ experts on board. We build dedicated teams for international clients which help them fill their technological and expertise gaps.
In addition to building extended development teams, we offer IT relocation, quality control, security testing, process and technical consulting as a service.
As a part of our core service — extended team, we provide web and mobile development, UI/UX design, big data and analytics, project management, business analysis, and Scrum training.
So far, we’ve helped more than 300 clients extend their development capacities with talented experts from Ukraine. Our clients come from a wide range of industries including (but not limited to) healthcare, education, fintech, travel, telecom, and ecommerce.
